| [`tag`](/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/simulation/tags/tag) | A single gameplay tag, which represents a hierarchical name of the form x.y that is registered in the GameplayTagsManager You can filter the gameplay tags displayed in the editor. |
